response.overview: A Shell-sponsored industrial science short examining the physics of liquid spray and dispersal, produced in the context of Shellâ€™s research into insecticides and chemical application. Using high-speed cinematography to visualize droplet formation and breakup processes normally invisible to the human eye, the film presents atomization as both a scientific phenomenon and a practical industrial problem, aligning technical research methods with educational demonstration.
response.title: Atomization
